name: Shape Invaders (Geru Games)
description:
--Controls--
WASD - Movement

Scrollwheel - Zoom in and out

Left Click - Shoot

Left Click and Hold to charge up and attack, when you hear the high pitched sound you're fully charged! Release to fire your special attack.

--Gameplay--

The shapes are invading, oh no!  You have nothing to defend yourself with besides this pesky little gun.  Fend off the shapes for as long as you can and become more and more powerful!  Upgrades will change your bullets and increase your stats.

--Post Mortem--

I think this one turned out pretty fun,  I wasn't able to playtest the game as much as I would've wanted to so the game may have a few bugs here and there.  Lemme know and I'll fix them as soon as possible.  

I wish I was able to add a bit more variety in enemies, but what came out should be fine for now.  There's about 7 enemies that function differently I believe.  Although they're all really just variants of 2 basic enemy types.

This game is for Ludum Dare 45 Compo - Start with Nothing.
